/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,libmahala.so.1.0.1 -o libmahala.so.1.0.1 CMakeFiles/libmahala.dir/PointCollector.cpp.o CMakeFiles/libmahala.dir/PolynomialMahalanobisDistance.cpp.o CMakeFiles/libmahala.dir/MahalanobisDistance.cpp.o CMakeFiles/libmahala.dir/BhattacharyyaDistance.cpp.o -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib: /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gapi.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.4.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.4.5.2
